SceneGraphTest Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
GlutApplication
Warning:
a child of this class must be instantiated before many opengl calls will work This class abstracts a glut application registers all relevant call backs these call backs can be overriden in classes that inherit form this one
GlutTimerThis class abstracts a glut timer registers all relevant call backs these call backs can be overriden in classes that inherit form this one This class uses the observer pattern through the boost signals library it also uses boost thread to implement the singleton pattern
GraphRendererThis class extends glut application by using the scene graphto manage a 3d scene and provides a viewer for that scene which can zoom in and out and rotate with the mouse
GraphRendererVisitorThis class implements the scene graph traversal in depth first order with backtracking and uses the visitor pattern
GroupNodeThis is a simple grouping node that is used to gather nodes together it implementation of setState and draw are the default empty it is node thats name captures the semantics of grouping other nodes
ListGraphVisitorThis class list the node in the order they would be encountered depth first and builds a formatted string using newline and tab characters to show the structure of the graph it follows a variant of the visitor desing pattern
RotationAnimationNode
SceneGraphThis class is the scene graph
SceneGraphNodeThis class is the base class for all the scene graph nodes
SolidSphereNodeThis class is a simple parametrized glu solid sphere that can be textured
TextureNode
Warning:
the glut application must be initialized before this node will work This class loads a texture from a bmp file and applies it to child nodes
TranslationNodeThis class is a simple parametrized open gl translation that applies to only its children
